channel.title: Piling on top of each other?
channel.description:
Hey all,
When people stand on each other, you can only see the top person...
eg. There are 50 people standing in one position..
I right click them.. it comes up with...
[code] walk here iownusobad [/code]
*walk here is my only option, but you get what i mean? you can only see the top person when u right click*
Please help?
